product.title: NUISISA 3-in-1 Hot Air Styler & Rotating Hair Dryer Brush with 2 Interchangeable Brushes | Anti-Frizz Ionic Technology for Straightening, Drying & Curling | 3 Heat Settings & 360° Rotation (Red)
product.title_excluding_brand: 3-in-1 Hot Air Styler & Rotating Hair Dryer Brush with 2 Interchangeable Brushes | Anti-Frizz Ionic Technology for Straightening, Drying & Curling | 3 Heat Settings & 360° Rotation (Red)
product.description: Color Red Material Plastic Wattage 750 Power Source Corded Electric
product.description_html:
Color	Red
Material	Plastic
Wattage	750
Power Source	Corded Electric
product.description_full:
Color Red Material Plastic Wattage 750 Power Source Corded Electric * 3-in-1 Multifunctional Styling Tool: This versatile hot air styler combines the functions of a hair dryer, straightener, and curling tool in one sleek device. Perfect for drying, straightening, and creating natural curls, it simplifies your hair routine while delivering professional-quality results at home.
 * 2 Interchangeable Brush Heads: Designed for all hair types, this set includes two rotating brush heads: a larger barrel for thick, voluminous hair and a smaller barrel for soft, casual styles. Easily switch between brushes to achieve your desired look with minimal effort.
 * 3 Heat Settings & 360° Rotation: Featuring three adjustable temperature settings (hot, warm, and cold), this styler caters to various hair types and styling needs. The 360° rotating brush heads allow for effortless drying and curling in both directions, ensuring a smooth, frizz-free finish.
 * Advanced Ionic Technology: Equipped with ionic technology, this hot air brush releases negative ions to lock in moisture, reduce frizz, and enhance shine. The high-quality heating element ensures even heat distribution, minimizing damage and leaving your hair soft, smooth, and healthy.
 * User-Friendly Design: The 360° rotating cord prevents tangling, making it easy to use at any angle. The lightweight, ergonomic design ensures comfortable handling, while the quick-heating feature (ready in 30 seconds) saves you time during your styling routine. Perfect for daily use at home or on the go.

Color Red Material Plastic Wattage 750 Power Source Corded Electric
  • 3-in-1 Multifunctional Styling Tool: This versatile hot air styler combines the functions of a hair dryer, straightener, and curling tool in one sleek device. Perfect for drying, straightening, and creating natural curls, it simplifies your hair routine while delivering professional-quality results at home.
  • 2 Interchangeable Brush Heads: Designed for all hair types, this set includes two rotating brush heads: a larger barrel for thick, voluminous hair and a smaller barrel for soft, casual styles. Easily switch between brushes to achieve your desired look with minimal effort.
  • 3 Heat Settings & 360° Rotation: Featuring three adjustable temperature settings (hot, warm, and cold), this styler caters to various hair types and styling needs. The 360° rotating brush heads allow for effortless drying and curling in both directions, ensuring a smooth, frizz-free finish.
  • Advanced Ionic Technology: Equipped with ionic technology, this hot air brush releases negative ions to lock in moisture, reduce frizz, and enhance shine. The high-quality heating element ensures even heat distribution, minimizing damage and leaving your hair soft, smooth, and healthy.
  • User-Friendly Design: The 360° rotating cord prevents tangling, making it easy to use at any angle. The lightweight, ergonomic design ensures comfortable handling, while the quick-heating feature (ready in 30 seconds) saves you time during your styling routine. Perfect for daily use at home or on the go.
